name: Runaway Santa
description:
Santa is at it again ... stealing milk and cookies from the middle class family in exchange for his NFT presents. The town has figured out that tax fraud and he's fleeing for his life. Help Santa run away. 

Avoid the waves of obstacles in Santa's path and collect presents to earn points and power ups. Smash the obstacles with snowballs to gain points. Race against the timer in Challenge mode and beat your high score in the Endless mode. Songs that will keep your Christmas cheers on.

This game is fully free and not monetized in any way.
